content:
Welcome to Mini 1454!


All thirteen of you are citizens of ScumVille, the most populated city in the world! Well, it used to be the most populated city, anyway. This place has cleared out since people started dying. Before she scrammed, the city's mayor elected fourteen citizens to discover who is destroying our city from within. Unfortunately, I've discovered that not all of the members of our council are working towards this goal. We've been infiltrated by the very people we're trying to find. But it's not all bad! I know who doesn't belong here!

The killers are...

BANG!

A bullet exits the side of Rob13's head. He falls to the floor, the killers' names on the tip of his tounge.

Rob13, Town Narrator, is shot through the head Night 0.

Damn. The mediocre flavor spewing from Rob13's mouth ended just a moment too soon and you're back to square one. The council will reconvene shortly, after the janitor gets here to clean up this mess.

General Rules:

1. Site-wide rules apply.
2. Play to your win condition.
3. Do not quote any information given by the mod. Paraphrasing is okay.
4. No cryptography or hidden text. If the text cannot be seen by the mod without quoting or copy-pasting your post, then you've broken this rule.
5. Do not use my color (#3CB371).
6. Don't be an asshole. Attacking a person's argument or post is fine. Attacking someone personally is not. Keep it civil. If you are seriously offended by something any player says during this game, then please PM me.
7. If you believe a mod error has been made, please PM me immediately. I prefer if you do not announce or discuss it in-game until I have confirmed that a mod error has occurred.
8. Once you are dead, you are permitted to make a single "Bah" post. Do not include any player names or anything related to the game in your post. If you're posting something that could influence the result of the game, you're doing it wrong.
9. Do not argue with the mod in thread. Feel free to PM me if you have any issues with any actions I've taken. I will happily listen to and seriously consider any comments or complaints - just not in the game thread.
10. Do not play against the spirit of the rules or of the game. This is intentionally a catch-all rule. I will always warn someone in-thread before any action is taken against them if I'm applying this rule.
11. This ruleset is subject to change at any time. If a change is made mid-game, it will be announced in-thread by the mod.

Voting Rules:

1. Votes should be made using bolded text (Vote: Player) or a vote tag (VOTE: Player). Unvotes are not required but highly appreciated.
2. If I can understand the vote, then it will count even if it doesn't follow the exact format listed above.
3. You may vote for a No Lynch in the same manner as you vote for a player.
4. A lynch (or no lynch) occurs when a simple majority is reached. A simple majority is half of the alive players rounded down plus one.
5. During twilight (the time between when the hammer vote is cast and I lock the thread), all players including the lynchee may continue to post.

Activity Rules:

1. A prod PM will be issued if any player does not post for 72 hours. Prods will be announced in-thread. You have 24 hours to pick up your prod either by posting or PM (if at night). After this time, I will begin seeking a replacement.
2. I will seek replacement immediately without waiting 24 hours if a player receives a third prod.
3. If you plan to be gone for over 48 hours, please announce that you will be V/LA in-thread. I will not count you as V/LA unless you post this in-thread. This is for the benefit of both myself and your fellow players. I will note all V/LA players in each vote count.

Deadline Rules:

1. The first day has a deadline of 21 days. Each subsequent day has a deadline of 14 days.
2. Automatic extensions are granted when a replacement replaces into the game with less than a week left in the day if necessary.The exact amount of time will be between 24 hours and 72 hours and will be determined by the moderator.
3. If the day deadline is reached without any majority vote, then a no lynch will occur. The day will never end by deadline while a replacement is being sought out.
4. Each night will end after 48 hours and no sooner. For the purposes of the night deadline, the weekend counts as 24 hours. The countdown for a night deadline will not start while a replacement is being sought out.
5. All night actions must be submitted by PM or a relevant QT. I greatly prefer PM.
6. Players on V/LA will receive a PM at the start of night. Any players that anticipate being unavailable over the entire night may submit actions early.

Sample Role PM:

Welcome to Mini 1454!

You are a Vanilla Townie.

Your only abilities are your voice and your vote.

You win when all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town member survives.

The game thread can be found here: viewtopic.php?f=2&t=28540

Please confirm by PM. Day 1 will start 48 hours after all role PMs have been sent out. See the game thread for the exact time.

The day will automatically begin 48 hours after all role PMs have been sent out. Players have 48 hours to confirm by PM or they will be prodded.

Confirmation Stage ends in (expired on 2013-05-20 23:45:00).

A bright and shining new day begins! The birds are chirping, the sun is shining, and the flowers are blooming! Oh, and all the pieces of that narrator guy have been picked up and taken to the morgue. Damn it! These murderers have made you fine gentlemen work on a day like today. They will pay for that...

Day 1 begins! Everyone has confirmed. With 13 alive, it takes 7 players to reach a lynch.

Deadline: (expired on 2013-06-10 22:45:00)

The first half of this post ended up being pretty good. The second half, not so much.

Firstly, I hate you GiF.
Secondly, sorry I didn't listen DV.
Thirdly, sorry to let ya down town.
Finally, GG GiF, I still hate you.

Final Mod Thoughts:

This was a torturous game for those watching, but it was fun to mod. No real issues (except one very minor mod slip-up that did not influence the game in any way). Great activity, which I would like to thank you all for - with only 3 activity-based replacements (and one of them being me throwing AA out of his hydra), you guys made this pretty damn easy for my first time. Thanks for being gentle.

Let's talk gameplay. OMG. When a PR claim is contradicted by someone else, and that someone else flips town, you now have 0 excuses not to lynch the lying PR. Props to GIF for talking his way out of situations that I probably would have just self-voted during. GIF was persistent despite all odds (even if he tended to cause the bad odds). This was definitely more a case of town losing than scum winning, though. See Dead QT for more details - seriously, it's like 280 posts of us going "WHY TOWN WHY". It was really fun to participate in though - I rarely see Dead QTs that active, and it's very fun for the mod when they're able to talk to deceased players actively about how the game is unfolding throughout. Cheers especially to Amrun for keeping me comapny in there.

Let's talk balance. Yes, town has a lot of protective power. But look at the game - 9v3v1. My reviewers and I were concerned with a worst-case scenario in which the SK stays alive for awhile and the SK/scum team hit all or primarily town players. This could mean a loss for town with only a single mislynch in a worst case scenario. To counteract that, a decent number of protective roles were put in. I'm happy with the balance of town power, even if they did wind up being overpowered by Day 3 due to the early SK lynch and the decision by AJ not to kill at all. Of course, that's not something I can plan for, as if I planned on the SK not killing the result would be a hopelessly underpowered town if the SK actually killed (which tends to happen more often than not). On final reflection, I'm actually not so happy with the scum power. The RoleCop should have been a Roleblocker. They won anyway, though, so *shrug*. You live and you learn.

I'm not going to advertise any of my upcoming games here because I don't want to pressure anyone or spam the thread, but if anyone is interested in participating in any future games I plan to mod, PM me. I'll be able to give you a list of setups in my pipeline (no gay jokes, please). I have quite a few stored up, some of which still have pre-ins available.
